Contents


Background

Scope and Content

Kenneth L. Woodward : Manuscripts

Kenneth L. Woodward : Audio-Visual Material

Kenneth L. Woodward : Digital Data

Kenneth L. Woodward : Printed Material

Kenneth L. Woodward Papers

Guide

University of Notre Dame Archives

2018

Creator: Woodward, Kenneth L.
Title: Kenneth L. Woodward Papers
Dates: 1953-2018.
Extent: 25 linear feet
Language: English.
Identification: KLW

Background

Catholic journalist; religion editor of Newsweek; author of The Book of Miracles and Making Saints.

Return to the Table of Contents

Scope and Content

Articles, letters, lectures, speeches, notebooks, interviews, manuscripts, and books, dating from 1959 to 2011, representing his career as a journalist, editor, and author. Tape recorded interviews; some CDs and DVDs. Data files (mostly Word or Word Perfect) containing drafts of articles, speeches, chapters from books, letters, and other documents.

Return to the Table of Contents

Return to the Table of Contents
